soffico.customerapi.message

Class MessageAdapterDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • soffico.customerapi.message.MessageAdapterDatabase

  • public class MessageAdapterDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a simple adapter/facade pattern that encapsulates all functions for creating, converting and accessing orchestra internal messages in the context of database

    • Method Detail

      • createMessageFromResultSet

        public static emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message createMessageFromResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet,
                                                                              java.lang.String rootName,
                                                                              java.lang.String namespace,
                                                                              java.lang.String row,
                                                                              boolean isUseMassData)
                                                                       throws OrchestraCustomerException,
                                                                              emds.epi.decl.exceptions.EpiBaseException
        This method creates an Orchestra message from the SQL resultset. It iterates over the resultset and creates a row element for each row. Every element contains column elements for each non null value in the row.
        Parameters:
        resultSet -
        rootName - Name of the created message
        namespace - Namespace of the created message
        row - Name of the created row-elements
        isUseMassData - If set to true, the message is created in massdata mode otherwise in normal mode
        Throws:
        OrchestraCustomerException
        emds.epi.decl.exceptions.EpiBaseException

      • createMessageFromResultSet

        public static emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message createMessageFromResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet,
                                                                              java.lang.String rootName,
                                                                              java.lang.String namespace,
                                                                              java.lang.String row,
                                                                              boolean isUseMassData,
                                                                              boolean createElementsForNullValues)
                                                                       throws OrchestraCustomerException,
                                                                              emds.epi.decl.exceptions.EpiBaseException
        This method creates an Orchestra message from the SQL resultset. It iterates over the resultset and creates a row element for each row.
        Parameters:
        resultSet -
        rootName - Name of the created message
        namespace - Namespace of the created message
        row - Name of the created row-elements
        isUseMassData - If set to true, the message is created in massdata mode otherwise in normal mode
        createElementsForNullValues - If set to true even for null values empty elements are created.
        Throws:
        OrchestraCustomerException
        emds.epi.decl.exceptions.EpiBaseException
